name: P.K.'s Place 4: Daphne and the Seventh Wonder!
overview: P.K.'s at it again! This time Daphne is his game show contestant and the grand prize is a trip to Giza, Egypt, and her picture on the cover of next month's P.K.'s Planet Magazine! In this adventure, your child will help Daphne collect equipment for her trip, while increasing his or her knowledge of geometry.
